comments.message:
Hi McDonald's

I've supported your for a long long time. I've being curious on why your fish burger always give only half slice of cheese and purposely place the cheese near the edge of the bun. Making the cheese "looks" like oozing out from the inside. Attached photo for viewing.

Greetings Sir/Madam, this evening, around 7pm, I was at the outlet at HG. I ordered two happy meals (one cheeseburger + small fries) and the other (nugget + small fries). As I was in a rush, I did not check the pack before leaving. When I arrived home, I realised that the HM small fries and cheeseburger i ordered were not in the pack (but the drinks were there). I am really shocked as I used to believe Mcdonalds crews would be efficient in their service. I hope that Mcdonalds HG will do something about it. I can still remember the service crew (runner), his name is Calvin, with a nonchalant attitude, he did not even bother to thank me or put the plastic bag properly while passing me the order.
Is the cable organiser only available for the lunch n dinner mcdelivery? I tried looking for the link to add it to my breakfast order but Juz can't find it!

Hi. I ordered thru Mcdelivery at 6pm and was supposed to receive the food 70mins ltr. Till now it has yet to be delivered. Called customer svs ..was told tt the outlet manager will call but alas no calls. My kids are truly disappointed tt they are not able to break fast w what they ordered and i have to go around looking for alternatives at the very last minute . Thanks alot for the really 'awesome' service!
Hi. Is it possible to get minion toy if i order happy meal thru mcdelivery?
